VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Luxury Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Luxury Fashion is arc {High Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Streetwear?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Streetwear is arc {High Fashion}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {High Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Streetwear to Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Luxury Fashion to High Fashion in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Streetwear and High Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Streetwear and High Fashion is {969}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Luxury Fashion and High Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Luxury Fashion and High Fashion is {374}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Streetwear?
SC.A: The total flow output from Streetwear is {864}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Streetwear?
SC.A: The total flow input by Streetwear is {1346}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 547? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {736} from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion}, a flow of {969} from {High Fashion} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {718} from {High Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 251? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {128} from {Streetwear} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 375 and 727? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {377} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {718} from {High Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Streetwear to High Fashion or from Streetwear to Luxury Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Luxury Fashion to Streetwear, from Streetwear to High Fashion, or from Streetwear to Luxury Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {High Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {High Fashion} and {Streetwear}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Luxury Fashion, Arc High Fashion, Arc Streetwear}.
